text: The Taste of Chicago (known locally as The Taste) is the world's largest food festival. It is held for five days in July in Chicago, Illinois in Grant Park. Many food vendors come to show and sell their products. The event is the largest festival in Chicago. Non-food-related events include live music on multiple stages. Musical acts can be local artists or nationally known artists like Carlos Santana, Moby, Kenny Rogers or Robert Plant. ==References== Category:Festivals in Chicago Category:July events
title: Taste of Chicago
